J.T. Realmuto has caught in 20 games so far, 2 more than any catcher in MLB.

With 20 out of 22, he's on pace to catch in 147, which would be the most by anyone in 14 years*

@TheGoodPhight 
*149 in 2008 by Jason Kendall and Russell Martin
